      public boolean rule​(Board board, Cell start, Cell dest, java.lang.String promote)
      Description copied from class: Pieces
      an abstract method that detect weather a movement is valid for certain piece.
      Specified by:
      rule in class Pieces
      Parameters:
      board - board pass the current game board
      start - start pass the starting cell for certain movement
      dest - dest pass the end cell for certain movement
      promote - store promoted role for Pawn
      Returns:
      true if the movement is valid, false otherwise.
